editorialNotes.standard: This blockbuster runnerÂ keeps charging ahead with loads of rewards to chase and special events set in cities across the world.

name: Tomb of the Mask: Pixel Maze

editorialNotes.standard: Speed is survival in this devilishly fast tomb-raiding arcade game. Like some glorious mix of Indiana Jones and Pac-Man, you race from room to room, nabbing all the coins you can while staying ahead of an ever-moving (and lethal) wall. With its crafty mazes, tricky traps, simple controls, and eye-popping retro minimalism, itâs an experience youâll happily lose yourself in.

Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercellâs awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package thatâs easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, thereâs no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: Itâs hard to understate Clash of Clansâ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobileâwe still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught.

editorialNotes.standard: It took less than a minute for us to get hooked on this series all over again. The sequel to Rovioâs blockbuster puzzler polishes the feathery fun to a golden sheenâand with more than just beautiful new graphics. Features like multi-stage levels, pig-punishing spells and choosing the order in which you fling birds make the game more irresistible than ever. Whether itâs your first Angry Birds game or your 10th, youâll be flying high in no time.

ios.subtitle: Control Mario with just a tap!

editorialNotes.standard: He's here! We're all about pulling off stylish moves with a single tap, thanks to super-simple, one-touch controls. But collecting all the pink coins? That takes skill. With tons of unlocks (including Luigi!), youâll be playing this one long after you reach the final flagpole.

name: Twerk Race 3D â Fun Run Game

editorialNotes.standard: It's back! Sprint for the leaderboards in the sequel to one of the App Store's most popular endless runners, which arrives with a host of fabulous improvements, from overhauled graphics to refined controls, original minecart and zip-line challenges, and much more.

From the second Barry Steakfries busts through that laboratory wall, Jetpack Joyride thrusts you into an unforgettable horizontal adventure. This stylish infinite runner gets your pulse pounding as you feverishly snag coins, dodge obstacles and take rides in crazy vehicles (think: robotic dragons and money-propelled birds). Itâs a classic thatâs only gotten better over the years, thanks to Halfbrick Studios' consistent updates.
editorialNotes.short: Brilliant controls and loads of fun power-ups that don't fade with age.

editorialNotes.standard: Always wanted to be a football star? Score! Hero puts you in the kit of a young upstart, making your way to bigger and better clubs. The controls couldnât be simplerâsimply draw a line where you want the ball to go, and let the action unfold. While the gameplay is easy to learn, Score! Hero also shines with depth, rewarding thoughtful passes and smart shots over wild swiping.
